channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: Explore a different side of Japan. Meet the locals and discover traditions and cultures not usually found in guidebooks.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef
channel.desc: In a country renowned for its food, Osaka is particularly noted for its culinary offerings. Join chef Saito Tatsuo as he explores flavors that originated in his hometown.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Deeper Look
channel.desc: With self-driving taxis operating in US cities and eyeing Japan, autonomous vehicles are no longer fiction. UC Berkeley's Steven Shladover unpacks the latest shifts in the technology.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
channel.desc: Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques! Featured recipe: Mushi Sushi.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: lotion tissues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Dr. Oshiro Kazue is a skilled mountain medic, dedicated to promoting awareness of alpine safety, and even spending her summers treating climbers from a cabin near the peak of the iconic Mt. Fuji.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Science View
channel.desc: All animals need sleep. Explore why and how it evolved. Also meet the developer of the AI Suitcase that helps the visually impaired walk more freely.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Kabuki Kool
channel.desc: Pattern, color, design, and tradition all play a role in creating kabuki characters. Expert Takahiro Ebisawa joins actor Kataoka Ainosuke to explore the fascinating world of costuming.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dive In Tokyo
channel.desc: We visit Kamata, a commercial district in southern Tokyo bustling with factories, cozy bars, public baths, and more. Along the way, we learn its history and meet the people who call it home.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Akasaka Yogetsu, a priest with an international following, is known for combining beatboxing with Buddhist mantras. He talks about Zen philosophy and the spirit of "living in the here and now.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsline Asia 24
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Passing The Torch Of Peace
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life: Airing Laundry
channel.desc: It's summer, and a group of women have gathered at the local well to do laundry in the shade. We learn about the different techniques and tools they used to wash and dry different types of kimonos.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Akasaka Yogetsu, a priest with an international following, is known for combining beatboxing with Buddhist mantras. He talks about Zen philosophy and the spirit of "living in the here and now.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan's Top Inventions
channel.desc: Discover the stories behind renowned Japanese products alongside our reporter. This time: lotion tissues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Kiyokawa Hiroki is working to share the traditional restoration method of "kintsugi" with people in Japan and around the world. He talks about the spirit of sustainability behind the technique.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Beauty Of Japanese Swords: Famous Masterpieces
channel.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, a sword made by Kuniyuki that is imbued with the power of the deity Fudo-myo-o.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Passing The Torch Of Peace
channel.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a variety of short programs focusing on Japan and Asia.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ukiyoe Edo Life(1)
channel.desc: Discover story behind the "36 Views of Mt. Fuji" woodprint series; "The Great Wave off Kanagawa" by Hokusai. It is not just a huge wave and Mt. Fuji, the boat caught in the wave have a reason.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: I Want To Connect With You
channel.desc: In November 2023, Muto Masatane and his wife Yuko welcomed a healthy baby girl. He lives with incurable ALS. We follow the couple navigating the challenges of parenting with love and determination.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus
channel.desc: Roughly 90% of Japan's plastic models are made in Shizuoka, an area whose manufacturing roots date back to shogun Tokugawa Ieyasu. We explore the latest developments for Japan's superb plastic models.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan Railway Journal
channel.desc: This year is the 60th anniversary of the Tokaido Shinkansen, the world's first high-speed rail! Join us as we look back on the railway's continued efforts to increase speed.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto
channel.desc: The dark-grey, clay roofing on shrines, temples, and Machiya townhouses is buffed and smoked to boost durability, water resistance, and luster. Craftsmen and roofers uphold the traditional techniques.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Lunch On!
channel.desc: We begin the Ehime Prefecture Special at a mikan orange farm, where a young man is diligently growing mikan and avocados on land inherited from his grandparents.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: I Want To Connect With You
channel.desc: In November 2023, Muto Masatane and his wife Yuko welcomed a healthy baby girl. He lives with incurable ALS. We follow the couple navigating the challenges of parenting with love and determination.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Goto Netsuko is an Aufguss master, the person in charge of circulating air and directing heat inside a sauna. She is one of Japan's best, a true ambassador for the natural sauna experience.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
channel.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each season.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: A women's soccer team was created to energize an aging community. The team's top striker has built strong friendships with older neighbors. But now that player might have another goal in mind.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus
channel.desc: Roughly 90% of Japan's plastic models are made in Shizuoka, an area whose manufacturing roots date back to shogun Tokugawa Ieyasu. We explore the latest developments for Japan's superb plastic models.

channel.desc: This year is the 60th anniversary of the Tokaido Shinkansen, the world's first high-speed rail! Join us as we look back on the railway's continued efforts to increase speed.

channel.title: Lunch On!
channel.desc: We begin the Ehime Prefecture Special at a mikan orange farm, where a young man is diligently growing mikan and avocados on land inherited from his grandparents.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk News 7
channel.desc: News 7 is NHK's flagship domestic evening news program, bringing you the latest from our Tokyo studio. It's presented with English audio on NHK World for our international viewers.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Newsroom Tokyo
channel.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: One In Every Japanese
channel.desc: 1 in 2500 people started farming in 2022. As we talk to new farmers who've come from totally different industries, we examine the values they have found in this labor-intense yet rewarding field.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Chatroom Japan
channel.desc: Greg Dvorak and Ono Kenji say Japan is preventing them from fulfilling something essential for their long-term happiness. They want the country to legalize same-sex marriage.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan In Focus
channel.desc: A new care facility in Japan without any barriers between people with disabilities and the community is spotlighted. We take a close look at how one woman user changes by interacting with the locals.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Special Program
channel.desc: * Broadcast only --- A wide range of topics featuring Japanese culture and society are introduced.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's Theme: The New Potential of Sharing. Sharing is a smart idea that strengthens relationships. From a diverse array of shared spaces to self-help devices, dive into designs for a shared future.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Asia Insight
channel.desc: As youth unemployment surges past 20%, young Chinese people laid off from corporate jobs are setting up business at street stalls to gain income. Some see a future in this new industry.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Frontrunners
channel.desc: Dr. Oshiro Kazue is a skilled mountain medic, dedicated to promoting awareness of alpine safety, and even spending her summers treating climbers from a cabin near the peak of the iconic Mt. Fuji.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan In Focus
channel.desc: A new care facility in Japan without any barriers between people with disabilities and the community is spotlighted. We take a close look at how one woman user changes by interacting with the locals.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Direct Talk
channel.desc: Social entrepreneur Maeda Yosuke developed an innovative system that can turn wastewater into a water resource. We asked him about his vision and sustainable approach to solving water problems.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Seasons Of Yamato
channel.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Medical Frontiers
channel.desc: A large-scale study in Japan has shown that improving one's diet and lifestyle can slow the progression of chronic kidney disease. Clinical trials in regenerative medicine are also underway.

channel.name: NHK World JP

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
channel.desc: Learn about Japanese home cooking with Master Chef Saito, based on traditional Japanese cooking techniques in five minutes! Featured recipe: Beef-wrapped Onigiri.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's Theme: The New Potential of Sharing. Sharing is a smart idea that strengthens relationships. From a diverse array of shared spaces to self-help devices, dive into designs for a shared future.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Texico
channel.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: The yokai Ubume was said to be a ghostly woman appearing at night, asking passersby to hold her child under threat of death. We examine how this terrifying figure came to be seen as a sympathetic one.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Face To Face
channel.desc: Imamura Shogo is a writer of historical fiction who showcases unlikely protagonists to explore modern issues. He talks about his methodology and his efforts to keep paper books alive.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Museum Japan
channel.desc: Aichi / Kataoka Mami (curator) Tokoname, a pottery town with over 900 years of history, creates products appropriate for the times. Kataoka finds the beauty that's present in functional objects.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Who Will Protect The
channel.desc: From Wengding Village in Yunnan Province, known as "China's last traditional village," the Wa people were relocated amidst tourism development, causing disruption in the lives of the ethnic minority.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Perfect 2 Hour Guide
channel.desc: Explore Izumo Oyashiro, one of Japan's most iconic and sacred shrines. With 1,300 years of history and countless myths, this ultimate two-hour tour reveals its deep spiritual and cultural appeal.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: The yokai Ubume was said to be a ghostly woman appearing at night, asking passersby to hold her child under threat of death. We examine how this terrifying figure came to be seen as a sympathetic one.

channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: Discover the unique, traditional method of roof thatching that uses Hinoki cypress bark.

channel.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Professionals
channel.desc: A documentary series that focuses on first-class professionals from various fields.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: What is causing the frequent torrential rain and floods in Japan? Linear rainbands. Find out why this phenomenon is hard to predict and the latest research on forecasting linear rainbands.

channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: Tokachi is in Japan's great northern land of Hokkaido, home to vast fields and sprawling pastures. Experience its vibrant summer colors through time-lapse photography.

channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.
